segments.text: Jenny , what are you going to do tomorrow morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know yet . What's your idea , Dad ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm thinking of taking you and Peter swimming . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But swimming in the winter is good for your body . Believe me .
segments.speaker: S1
